page.title: 09Games.
page.content: The 2 favourite children's games are 'Tick' and 'Kick the Can'.They are best played by about 10 children.In 'Tick'one child is 'on'.The others are given a few seconds to run away.The one who is 'on' chases and tries to 'tick' or touch the others.There are many variations of the game-e.g.'Shadow Tick'when the chaser has to jump on the others' shadows or 'Scarecrow Tick' where the touched players have to stand still until released by being tagged by a colleague. In 'Kick the Can' the player who is 'on' has to cover his face while the others hide.The object is to find them all before they return to base and kick over a tin can. If they all do so the original child is 'on' again otherwise thefirst child to be caught is now 'on'.
